long_description: After your next muddy hike with your 4-legged pal, protect your car seat and comfort your tuckered out pup with the Kurgo Loft Bench Seat Cover. Ripstop polyester fabric is waterproof and machine washable. Under-seat and behind-seat attachments create a snug fit. Easy to install and remove. Kurgo Loft Bench Seat Cover is 55 in. wide; may not provide side-to-side coverage on extra large vehicles.
short_description: After your next muddy hike with your 4-legged pal, protect your car seat and comfort your tuckered out pup with the Kurgo Loft Bench Seat Cover.
